Best Rated Orthopedic Spine Surgeons NYC
Best Rated Orthopedic Spine Surgeons NYC
For the past two decades Dr. Sean McCance, a board certified NYC spine surgeon, has directed one of the leading spine practices in New York,

including lumbar (back) & cervical (neck) injury diagnosis and surgery. He has been recognized by his peers as one of the most accomplished spine surgeons in the field. Since establishing his best in class practice on the Upper East Side in Manhattan, Dr. McCance has personally performed over 6,000 spine surgeries on patients from all over the world and from all walks of life. Spinal surgery is a sub-

specialty of orthopedic surgery that involves the diagnosis and treatment of a range of conditions related to the back and neck. Dr. McCance always exhausts all conservative non-surgical options and treatments, if appropriate, before he recommends surgery of the spine.
Medical Society of the State of New York
Medical Society of the State of New York

When back pain or neck pain becomes chronic, intense, or interferes with your normal, daily activities, it is time to visit the NYC spine surgeon. Only someone trained in the intricacies of the spine can accurately diagnose your unique problem and present you with an appropriate customized treatment plan and options. Once your problem is fully analyzed and a definitive diagnosis is obtained, we offer our patients treatment options ranging from non-operative to surgical.
(Upper East Side, Manhattan, NY) is a best in class orthopedic spine surgery practice that treats patients from around the world. Our orthopedic surgeons (

) offer a wide variety of surgical and non-surgical treatment options to help eliminate or ease your back & neck pain and to treat scoliosis and related curvatures of the spine. Our board certified NYC orthopedic spine surgeons exhaust all conservative non-surgical options and treatments, before we recommend spine surgery.
Our board certified orthopedic spine surgeons have performed over 14,000 spine surgeries

Customizing treatment options to the individual is an important part of managing spine and neck problems. The wide variety of spine disorders means that treatment options vary too. In fact, two people with the same spine disorder will be managed differently because of differences in severity of symptoms and other medical factors that are unique to each person.
Our staff can contact your insurance carrier for you
We can obtain pre-authorization from your insurance company for you
All appointments for diagnostic tests (X-rays, MRIs, etc. will be made by our staff on your behalf)
When appropriate, your orthopedic surgeon will consult with other doctors involved in your care
When one of our orthopedic surgeons makes a referral for you, a staff member will make the appointment for you; as one patient put it, I never had to lift the phone
Our NYC spine surgery practice offers true concierge medicine to all patients

When back pain, scoliosis, or neck pain becomes chronic, intense, or interferes with your normal, daily activities, it is time to visit the NYC orthopedic spine surgeons. Only doctors trained in the intricacies of the spine can accurately diagnose your unique problem and present you with an appropriate customized treatment plan and options (surgical or nonsurgical).

We will begin by evaluating you completely to determine the exact cause of your back or neck pain. We listen carefully and test thoroughly before we diagnose. Even though we are a surgical practice, we do not always favor a surgical solution. Our patients can often benefit from treatments that require no surgical intervention at all. We will get you out of pain and treat your condition.

Dr. Lonner completed my scoliosis surgery almost twenty years ago. I recently saw him for a follow-up visit. His expertise, professionalism, and genuine concern is unmatched. Although I don't see him often, it's always nice to visit him and his office staff. The quality of care that he provides has remained consistent throughout the years. You can read all about his stellar work online, but his character, patience, and due diligence shines most.

Dr. McCance performed spine surgery on me a few months ago and I am back to my old self again. I traveled to New York City for the very best, he came highly recommended to me from a family friend who also had a herniated disc and Dr. McCance performed surgery on him as well. He is talented, kind and really thorough. He performed a 2 level laminectomy on my lumbar spine and when I tell you, I felt normal a week laterI sure did! He is awesome and his team is so wonderful to work with!

I was suffering from chronic neck and arm pain, was diagnosed with a herniated disc. After trying physical therapy and epidurals and medication for over a year, I went to to see Dr. McCance, a spine surgeon in nyc who recommended an ACDF at C5/6. I had the surgery over 10 years ago, and have been pain-free, With an occasional ache in my neck. I have been able to return to all activities. Including sports and heavy lifting wich is part of job. I thank you and would recommend Dr. McCance anybody with neck problem who needs surgery..

I had a consult with 6 different spine surgeons in Manhattan. I selected Dr. Sean mCCance because I trusted my gut. Its always right. Wow - amazing experience all around. What a class act. He is the best. Pain free and so happy. Easy recovery - thank you!

I took my 10 Year old daughter for an appointment last week with Dr Lonner. We an excellent experience at our evaluation. Dr Lonner was very thorough and answered all of our questions and concerns regarding her possible scoliosis. He is so knowledgeable and direct and we felt seen and heard. Also his staff was wonderful when we got there and made the appointment that we were already anxious about quite enjoyable! 5 stars all around.

children.name: Have an expert board certified orthopedic spine surgeon from Spine Associates review your diagnosis and treatment plan so you can be certain of your next steps. Get the answers and peace of mind you need  quickly and from the comfort of your home.

We offers patients anywhere in the world the same level of medical care they would receive in an office-based setting, without ever leaving their home. Treatments and appointments through virtual consultations may include: diagnosis after receiving imaging reports, post-operative follow-ups, a referral to Physical Therapy, imaging such as an MRI or X-ray, lab testing and other diagnostic studies, or evaluation by sub-specialists.

During your in person consultation your NYC board certified spine surgeon will perform a thorough assessment of your condition, a discussion of your symptoms and medical history will transpire as well as a physical examination. You will receive a review of imaging studies (if you have any), and we will have a discussion with you of treatment options, including both surgical and non-surgical approaches.

Our orthopedic spine surgery practice office specializes in taking exceptional care of each patient from the initial consultation to the post-operative period. The honor and privilege of caring for our patients come with the responsibility and dedication of the surgeons staff to the utmost standard of excellence in patient care and final surgical outcome.
Our best in class, Upper East Side NYC scoliosis, back pain, & neck pain diagnosis & surgery practice,

, is honored to provide you with highly personalized and comprehensive care. Our philosophy of direct management of your case by an expert best in class orthopedic spine surgeon has made us one of the most trusted and respected spine surgery practices on the Upper East Side in NYC and the world. Feel free to contact our board certified orthopedic spine surgery specialists today to discuss your unique condition and start yourself on the road to recovery.
